project_name: Multi Agent Reinforcement Learning - Google Football
purpose: Use Google Football (FIFA) as a tool of understanding Multi Agent Reinforcement Learning
short_description: Our project explores multi-agent reinforcement learning (MARL) through the Google Football FIFA environment. We aim to solve the challenge of coordinating multiple agents in dynamic, high-pressure environments where teamwork is essential. Using PPO as a baseline, and extending the work to similar and/or theoretical algorithms like PPG to understand why algorithms work better or worse in different environments.
